title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: This enchanting blue and white pitcher exudes elegance and charm. Adorned with intricate gold detailing and a prominent ornate emblem, it serves as both a functional item and a decorative piece. Ideal for storing potions, elixirs, or refreshing beverages, the sturdy handle provides ease of use while the wide spout allows for smooth pouring. Its refined design makes it a coveted treasure in any adventurer's collection. This pitcher not only enhances the aesthetic of your inventory but may also possess mysterious properties that can aid in your quests. Embrace the allure and utility of this striking game item!
